name: Outro
commands: You! Talk!|What is going on here?|Monsters, Mondsorians?
Hardly a difference between the two, if you ask me.
Heh, you have... no clue?|Good, I can die in... peace...
Maybe.. I too will become a... revenant...
I guess in all the excitement... we ignored the sewer stench...
Right, now we should be able to exit around here.
Don't you wanna take this tome first?
Use dark magic?|It's been so long...
I'm sure the whole 'evil' magic thing is nonsense.|It's the user who is really good or evil.
I suppose you're right...|I'll give it a go.
I didn't want to see... those things again.
My father fled Aurelia for... dabbling in necromancy.
And you were accepted here, right?
Well, not exactly.|He was still hunted down and killed.|Really, I'm not surprised. It's a crime against life itself!
Hm, do they think, or feel, like we do?
I don't know...|But I don't care to know, just thinking about it...
Oh! Your father...|I don't think they'd debase his Majesty like that... for now.
Jav! What did they do to you... to pops?
We ought to get you to somewhere to recuperate, quick!
I will heal him, but we need to find shelter soon.|I forsee rain...
Good idea, we need to find a town, posthaste!
It's okay, Javi.|I'm sure you tried your best...
